channel.title: Tops on Health Put Simply
channel.description: Recent content in Tops on Health Put Simply

item.description: Hi, my name is Graham Chalfant, and this site is a way for me to share the things I have learned living with a therapist, nutritionist, doctor, and healthcare professional. I grew up in Charlotte, NC, with a highly health-conscious family. As a child, I thought my parents were psychotic and despised their health choices. I still have trust issues with my mom after she tried to feed my zucchini brownies…
